name: Capsule Defender 3D
description:
*HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THE WINDOWS VERSION, NOT THE WEBGL VERSION!!*

A 3D recreation of Capsule Defender with a gritty, realistic art style and more features to accommodate for the new 3D FPS perspective.

Use WASD to move, LeftControl to crouch (never required) and LMB to shoot.

As time progresses you will unlock new weapons and the difficulty will ramp up. 

More enemy types start to appear as the time that you have survived goes up, these include a sprinter, a heavy and a normal enemy.
